message: Let's split it evenly and avoid losses due to inflation.

Since any money you receive is now worth 20% less to you due to inflation, this 40$ is equivalent to 32$ for you. If you reject and we continue to the next round, your share will be worth even less. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
I'm taking into account the inflation effect on my share. This offer is more reasonable considering the decreasing value of my potential gain.
